solution_line_template: After buying {bought_gum_pieces} pieces of gum Ariana has {initial_gum_pieces} + {bought_gum_pieces} = <<{initial_gum_pieces}+{bought_gum_pieces}={gum_after_buying}>>{gum_after_buying} pieces of gum.
After giving her {friends_given_gum} friends gum Ariana has {gum_after_buying} - {friends_given_gum} = <<{gum_after_buying}-{friends_given_gum}={gum_remaining}>>{gum_remaining} pieces of gum left.
